channel.title: ggplot2 on Clare's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in ggplot2 on Clare's Blog

item.title: Combining inset plots with facets using ggplot
item.description: I recently spent some time working out how to include mini inset plots within ggplot facets, and I thought I would share my code in case anyone else wants to achieve a similar thing.

item.title: Brief introduction to ggpairs
item.description: In this blog post I will introduce a fun R plot, ggpairs, that’s useful for exploring distributions and correlations.
